column5: Can anyone tell me where I can find the digital line counter add on/side cover for the C3 and C4.  I can't seem to find them anywhere. I seen than many moons ago. If you used one of these add ons, are they any good?  Thanx, Daniel OCH
I do remember them. Le barons used to have them in their catalog (I'm sure many other places had them as well).  I have not seen them for a 3-4 years however. Ebay might be an option.
personally i wasnt very impressed by them..
Tried ebay with no luck. Skel I figured they were probably crap.  Thanx guys Daniel OCH

I bought one and was not impressed with quality for the $ charged. I took it back to Lebarons after it stopped working second time out. It would turn on but you could see the counter not registering when letting out line.   Better off to look for a Daiwa or Okuma
